price: 69 Leurs tourments seront redoublés le Jour de la résurrection. Voués à les subir éternellement, ils seront couverts d’humiliation.
arabic: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yuḍāʿaf lahu al-ʿadhābu yawma al-qiyāmati wayakhlud fīhi muhānan
